org.apereo.cas.util.spring

Class CustomBeanValidationPostProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.validation.beanvalidation.BeanValidationPostProcessor
      • org.apereo.cas.util.spring.CustomBeanValidationPostProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.config.BeanPostProcessor, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

    public class CustomBeanValidationPostProcessor
extends org.springframework.validation.beanvalidation.BeanValidationPostProcessor
    Provides a custom TraversableResolver that should work in JPA2 environments without the JPA2 restrictions (i.e. getters for all properties).
    Since:
    3.4
